Sentence.value: All hospital staff, patients, and visitors should use PPE when there will be contact with blood or other bodily fluids.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: All hospital staff, [[patients|C0030705]], and visitors should use PPE when there will be contact with [[blood|C0005767]] or other bodily fluids.

Sentence.value: - A surgical mask helps stop germs in your nose and mouth from spreading.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - A [[surgical mask|C0181758]] helps stop germs in your [[nose|C0028429]] and mouth from spreading.

Sentence.value: - Visitors wear gowns if they are visiting a patient who is in isolation due to an illness that can be easily spread.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Visitors wear [[gowns|C0181064]] if they are visiting a patient who is in [[isolation|C0260397]] due to an illness that can be easily spread.
